name: 張中訓
objective: The course will provide an over-all review on the dynastic past of imperial China. Then, it will describes the history of China from the Opium War (1839-42) to the present with special emphasis on the down fall of the Ching dynastic (1644-1912),the Republican revolution, the experiment with republican government , warlordism , the Northern  Expedition, the Nanking government, the Sino-Japanese war, China under Communist rule and socio-economic as well as policical development of  Taiwan.
